topics.body:
So I'm gonna copypaste a bit from a fanfic I've been following. It's too good not to share!
[bq]"You ain't one of them highfalutin' types, are ya?" She asked, the suspicion in her tone showing she didn't think too highly of ponies like that.
"'Highfoo-wha..?" Spike asked, his face screwed up in befuddlement.
"It means having an unacceptably high opinion of yourself compared to others." Twilight supplied.
"A high....OH!" He turned back to Applejack, "You mean a Dickhead!" He shook his head, "Don't worry, that's not my style. I got a cousin who's almost that ponified, unfortunately. "[/bq]
